Package org.opensha2.calc

Hazard calculation classes and utilties.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NamedLocation
    Marker interface for enums of Locations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalcConfig
    Calculation configuration.
    CalcConfig.Builder
    A builder of configuration instances.
    CalcConfig.Curve
    Hazard curve calculation configuration.
    CalcConfig.Deagg
    Deaggregation configuration data container.
    CalcConfig.Output
    Hazard curve and file output settings.
    CalcConfig.Performance
    Performance and optimization settings.
    Calcs
    Static probabilistic seismic hazard analysis calculators.
    Deaggregation
    Hazard deaggregation.
    Deaggregation.Exporter  
    GridCalc Deprecated
    Hazard
    The result of a hazard calculation.
    HazardInput
    A GroundMotionModel input that carries Rupture rate information along with it
    InputList
    Lightweight List wrapper of HazardInputs.
    Results
    Factory class for reducing and exporting various result types.
    Site
    Site characteristics container.
    Site.Builder
    A reusable Site builder.
    Sites
    Site factory class used primarily for creating iterables over groups of sites.
    SystemInputList
    A List of HazardInputs that contains a reference to the parent SystemSourceSet from which the inputs were derived.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CurveType
    Curve type identifiers.
    CurveValue
    Hazard curve value types.
    ExceedanceModel
    Uncertainty models govern how the values of a complementary cumulative normal distribution (or probability of exceedence) are computed given a mean, μ, standard deviation, σ, and other possibly relevant arguments.
    NehrpTestCity Deprecated
    ReturnPeriod
    Identifiers of common return periods, also referred to in PSHA as probabilities of exceedance.
    ThreadCount
    The number of threads with which to intialize thread pools.
    Vs30
    Identifiers for commonly used values of Vs30.
